name: Knife Hit (itch) (lotofgame)
description:
click on the gift box and get your gift (optional)

choose your knife and target (optional)

if you level up your knife, it will earn you more apples when you collect apples (optional)

press the play button or enter key and start the game

throw knives by pressing the spacebar or clicking on the screen

if your knife is worth the knives you throw, you will lose

throw knives at regular apples and golden apples and collect them (golden apple is worth 50 apples)
